mapper.select: SELECT prcs_dir_code, prcs_plan_code, prcs_dir_name, prcs_dir_date, prcs_start_date, prcs_end_date, find_cdnm('0R', prcs_dir_sts) AS prcs_dir_sts, find_emp_name(emp_code) AS emp_code FROM prcs_dir ORDER BY prcs_dir_code DESC

SELECT prcs_dir_de_code, prcs_dir_code, prod_code, prcs_plan_amt, prcs_dir_amt, prcs_start_de_date, prcs_end_de_date, find_cdnm('0S', prcs_ing_sts) AS prcs_ing_sts, find_emp_name(emp_code) AS emp_code FROM prcs_dir_de WHERE prcs_dir_code = #{prcsDirCode} ORDER BY prcs_dir_de_code

SELECT DISTINCT p.prcs_plan_code, p.prcs_plan_name, p.prcs_plan_date, p.prcs_start_date FROM prcs_plan p JOIN prcs_plan_de d ON p.prcs_plan_code = d.prcs_plan_code WHERE d.prcs_dir_sts = 'T1' ORDER BY p.prcs_plan_code DESC

SELECT find_prod_name(prod_code) AS prod_name, find_prcs_name(prcs_code) AS prcs_name, mp_code, find_mat_name(mp_code) AS mat_name, bom_unit, bom_amt * #{prcsDirAmt} AS bom_amt, prcs_seq FROM v_prod_bom WHERE prod_code= #{prodCode} AND bom_yn='O' AND mp_kind='M' ORDER BY prcs_seq
